details.description: Public interface that defines the shape of account data but has no JSDoc describing properties, units or constraints.
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc describing `id` and `balance`, example usage, and note about units/validation.

details.description: Public function performing a numeric calculation (financially-sensitive). No documentation on parameter semantics, rate units, rounding, or edge-cases.
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc: description, param descriptions, return description, examples and explicit notes about rounding and edge-cases.

details.description: Exported class (public API surface) with no documentation about lifecycle, storage semantics (in-memory), or thread-safety/validation.
details.fix_explanation: Document class purpose, storage semantics (in-memory), and provide examples and remarks about persistence and validation.

details.description: Public method: missing contract details (returning null vs throwing, lookup complexity, behavior when id is missing).
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc specifying return type semantics (returns `Account | null`), no-throw guarantee, and example usage.

details.description: Public method: missing contract (overwrites existing accounts, no validation performed).
details.fix_explanation: Add JSDoc describing overwrite behavior, lack of validation, and example usage.
